name: Will You Ever Return
description:
"You'll laugh so hard you'll cry, and have nightmares later"
5 out of 5 The Arts Desk

"A game that will move, scare, disturb and touch you. A visual and aural masterpiece that challenges indie gaming's aesthetic norms and something that will surprise and intrigue you in too many ways to list." IndieGames.com

"... as clever as it is stupid – i.e. very." RPS

ARROWS = MOVE

SPACE = ACTION

SHIFT = RUN

ESCAPE = MENU/CANCEL

Man has it all in his hands, and it all slips through his fingers from sheer cowardice.

Features:

*Well Under 2 HOURS OF unSOLID GAMEPLAY.
*LARGE filesize for NOT MUCH CONTENT
*Irritating graphics including; badly cut sprite sheets, photoshop failure and not much more.
*A limited area to explore and unearth very few secrets.
*Over one unique character.
*Shallow and restricted battles.
*An irritating and frankly weird soundtrack by people you've never heard of.
